Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ra.raadmin

Interface AdminPreferenceSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdminPreferenceSessionLocal, AdminPreferenceSessionRemote
    public interface AdminPreferenceSession
    Session bean to handle admin preference administration
    Version:
    $Id: AdminPreferenceSession.java 23202 2016-04-14 08:53:01Z mikekushner $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addAdminPreference​(X509CertificateAuthenticationToken admin, AdminPreference adminpreference)
      Adds a admin preference to the database.
      boolean changeAdminPreference​(X509CertificateAuthenticationToken admin, AdminPreference adminpreference)
      Changes the admin preference in the database.
      boolean changeAdminPreferenceNoLog​(X509CertificateAuthenticationToken admin, AdminPreference adminpreference)
      Changes the admin preference in the database without logging.
      boolean existsAdminPreference​(String certificatefingerprint)
      Checks if a admin preference exists in the database.
      AdminPreference getAdminPreference​(String certificatefingerprint)
      Finds the admin preference belonging to a certificate serial number.
      AdminPreference getDefaultAdminPreference()
      Function that returns the default admin preference.
      void saveDefaultAdminPreference​(AuthenticationToken admin, AdminPreference defaultadminpreference)
      Function that saves the default admin preference.

    • Method Detail

      • getAdminPreference

        AdminPreference getAdminPreference​(String certificatefingerprint)
        Finds the admin preference belonging to a certificate serial number.
        Parameters:
        certificatefingerprint - The certificate finger print of the certificate the admin uses as a credential.
        Returns:
        null if the admin does not exist.

      • addAdminPreference

        boolean addAdminPreference​(X509CertificateAuthenticationToken admin,
                           AdminPreference adminpreference)
        Adds a admin preference to the database.
        Parameters:
        admin - An X509CertificateAuthenticationToken representing the admin the preference should cover.
        adminpreference - the admin preference to add.
        Returns:
        false if admin already exists.

      • changeAdminPreference

        boolean changeAdminPreference​(X509CertificateAuthenticationToken admin,
                              AdminPreference adminpreference)
        Changes the admin preference in the database.
        Parameters:
        admin - An X509CertificateAuthenticationToken representing the admin the preference should cover.
        adminpreference - the admin preference to add.
        Returns:
        false if admin does not exist.

      • changeAdminPreferenceNoLog

        boolean changeAdminPreferenceNoLog​(X509CertificateAuthenticationToken admin,
                                   AdminPreference adminpreference)
        Changes the admin preference in the database without logging.
        Parameters:
        admin - An X509CertificateAuthenticationToken representing the admin the preference should cover.
        adminpreference - the admin preference to add.
        Returns:
        false if admin does not exist.

      • existsAdminPreference

        boolean existsAdminPreference​(String certificatefingerprint)
        Checks if a admin preference exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        certificatefingerprint - The certificate finger print of the certificate the admin uses as a credential.
        Returns:
        true if it exists

      • getDefaultAdminPreference

        AdminPreference getDefaultAdminPreference()
        Function that returns the default admin preference.
        Returns:
        the default admin preference.

      • saveDefaultAdminPreference

        void saveDefaultAdminPreference​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                AdminPreference defaultadminpreference)
                         throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Function that saves the default admin preference.
        Parameters:
        admin - An AuthenticationToken for authorization.
        defaultadminpreference - The AdminPreference to save as default.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the local AuthenticationToken wasn't authorized to /system_functionality/edit_systemconfiguration
